model.utente

Class UtenteDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.utente.UtenteDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UtenteDBInterface

    public final class UtenteDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements UtenteDBInterface
    This class manages stored data about Users into the database.
